house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1999 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher,Garage Door Opener, Intercom System, Kitchen Island, Microwave, WetBar
